column5: Well the other day when we were out crappie fishing, I posted pictures of our fish, two were mine but one was Sonny's ... and because he has been having such a hard time on the ice this year ... catching carp and all, I figured I should atleast post a pic of him with a fish he actually targetted...  Great time out with my brother, I had a blast!
It is a little dark in the picture... it could be a carp  I am not saying anything, I am just saying with that lighting and all
How could Sonny not be doing well .  When I met him he was doing very very well.  Nice Hut Sonny.I know when Jen is not around you do well
curious, where did you get the minnows?? i herd that there was a minnow shortage in the area recently???
I got the minnows at Fishmasters Bait and Tackle in Dunnville!  776 Main St E.  He usually has minnows in stock!
Wait just one second Mike - ME??? you think I am the jinks... hehehe, ok we will go with that if you insist... just to make my brother feel better.  See you in May!  Cheers, Jen
